game.name: The Reason My Wife Has Gotten More Beautiful
game.shortDescription: Rintaro Tsukamoto is a tall, slender man with a clean-cut appearance, who is notably fit for his age. Unlike many of his peers, he maintains a disciplined lifestyle, working hard at the office, contributing to household chores at home, and taking care of his appearance.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rintaro Tsukamoto is a tall, slender man with a clean-cut appearance, who is notably fit for his age. Unlike many of his peers, he maintains a disciplined lifestyle, working hard at the office, contributing to household chores at home, and taking care of his appearance.
